name: Saint Seiya Sagittarius Armor
description:
Sharing your images created with this Lora in the comments below means a lot to me, Also let me know your top 5 knights in the comments that will affect the queue for my next Loras, I'm thinking of other Saint Seiya knights, Asgard/Poseidon/Hades arcs

Creating Loras is expensive please consider buying me a coffee so you can help me continue to create and share my work with the world. Your support will allow me to invest in better equipment, and take the time to create new and exciting pieces

SAGITTARIUS ARMOR

The Sagittarius Armor is a powerful and majestic armor worn by the Sagittarius Gold Saint in the Saint Seiya anime and manga series. It is one of the twelve Zodiac armors, each representing a constellation.

This LORA captures the Armor of Sagittarius, ignoring the character, trying to be flexible to be worn by males or females. is based on SD1.5 , and works with Anime models but was not intended for that. I will train another one based on Anime models later on.

The Lora works well with strength between 0.5 and 0.7; it was trained on images of 768 by 768 so use that resolution preferably. Also, I recommend using Image to Image and control-net for scaling instead of high res fix but is a matter of choice.

WARNING:

1- The bow is not working well will be fixed in an update. include bow in a negative prompt
2- Wings are difficult but useful, include Long gold wings or long metal wings in the prompt

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description:
SAGITTARIUS ARMOR

The Sagittarius Armor is a powerful and majestic armor worn by the Sagittarius Gold Saint in the Saint Seiya anime and manga series. It is one of the twelve Zodiac armors, each representing a constellation.

This LORA captures the Armor of Sagittarius, ignoring the character, trying to be flexible to be worn by males or females. is based on SD1.5 , and works with Anime models but was not intended for that. I will train another one based on Anime models later on.

The Lora works well with strength between 0.5 and 0.7; it was trained on images of 768 by 768 so use that resolution preferably. Also, I recommend using Image to Image and control-net for scaling instead of high res fix but is a matter of choice.

WARNING:

1- The bow is not working well will be fixed in an update. include bow in a negative prompt
2- Wings are difficult but useful, include Long gold wings or long metal wings in the prompt
